title: K001: Release Workflow & CI Gates
description: Validate the full release process: SemVer version bump, git tag v0.1.0, CI builds all artifacts (Keystone service image, Keystone Operator image, c5c3-operator image, Helm charts), pushes to GHCR, FluxCD HelmRelease picks up the new version. Add generated code verification gate (make manifests && make generate && git diff --exit-code). Verify all CI gates pass: lint green, tests with coverage thresholds, E2E scenarios pass reliably (zero flakiness across 3 consecutive runs).
